segments.text: Hello , how are you ? I am Jack .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I saw that your Corollas are on sale .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is really a good deal . $ 1,000 discount . I've never seen a sale as good as this one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . It has 1.8 liter engine . This one comes with all power options , air condition , CD player , full size spare tire , automatic transmission and ABC . The window price is $ 17,000 , and I can give You for $ 16.000 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You must be kidding ! You cannot get that price anywhere .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you put down a $ 2,000 deposit , and I'll talk to my manager , see what we can do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Just talk to your manager and let me know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I'll be right back ... Congratulations ! The manager approved the final price $ 15,000 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The price is fine if you give me free security system and free carpet mats .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are really tough . You got a deal .
segments.speaker: S1
